hero.name: Tăng Văn Dẽ
hero.title: Backend Developer
hero.subtitle: Backend Developer
hero.description: I’m a Senior Backend Developer and Team Leader with extensive experience building scalable and reliable systems using .NET technologies. My expertise lies in designing robust architectures, optimizing performance, and leading teams to deliver high-quality software solutions. I’m passionate about crafting backend systems that serve as the solid foundation for exceptional user experiences. With a strong focus on clean code, maintainability, and best practices, I ensure that every project I lead is not only functional but also future-proof.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: About Me
about.description: I'm a passionate Backend Developer with expertise in modern web technologies. I love creating digital experiences that are both beautiful and functional.

whyHireMe.title: Why hire me for your next project?
paragraphs: With over 7 years of experience in software development, I've worked on projects ranging from small business websites to enterprise-level applications. I specialize in creating scalable, maintainable code that follows industry best practices.
My expertise lies in designing robust backend architectures. I'm passionate about clean code, performance optimization, and delivering exceptional user experiences.
I believe in continuous learning and staying up-to-date with the latest technologies and industry trends. This allows me to bring innovative solutions to every project.

experience.title: Experience
experience.subtitle: My professional journey in software development, from startups to enterprise companies.

experiences.description: Leading development of enterprise applications using .NET and Python. Implemented Clean Architecture and CQRS pattern.
Developed backend services for telecom applications using .NET
Developed responsive websites and web applications for various clients. Worked with modern frontend frameworks and backend technologies.

certificates.title: Certificates & Achievements
certificates.subtitle: Professional certifications that validate my expertise in various technologies and methodologies.

certificates.title: Microsoft Certified: Azure Fundamentals (AZ-900)
certificates.description: Demonstrates foundational knowledge of cloud services and how those services are provided with Microsoft Azure.

certificates.title: Microsoft Certified: Azure Data Fundamentals (DP-900)
certificates.description: Demonstrates foundational knowledge of core data concepts and how they are implemented using Microsoft Azure data services.

certificates.title: Microsoft Certified: Azure Developer Associate (AZ-204)
certificates.description: Demonstrates expertise in developing, testing, and maintaining cloud applications and services on Microsoft Azure.

certificates.title: Microsoft Certified: Azure Administrator Associate (AZ-104)
certificates.description: Validates skills in implementing, managing, and monitoring an organization's Microsoft Azure environment.

certificates.title: PROFESSIONAL SCRUM MASTER™ I (PSM I)
certificates.description: Certifies knowledge of Scrum framework and ability to facilitate Scrum events and remove impediments.

certificates.title: Oracle Cloud Infrastructure 2023 AI Certified Foundations Associate
certificates.description: Validates foundational knowledge of Oracle Cloud Infrastructure AI services and machine learning capabilities.

certificates.title: Oracle Cloud Data Management 2023 Certified Foundations Associate
certificates.description: Demonstrates expertise in Oracle Cloud data management services including databases, analytics, and data integration.

certificates.title: Oracle Cloud Infrastructure 2023 Certified Foundations Associate
certificates.description: Certifies foundational knowledge of Oracle Cloud Infrastructure services and cloud computing concepts.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: A showcase of my recent work and personal projects that demonstrate my skills and creativity.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce solution with React frontend and .NET backend, featuring user authentication, product management, and payment integration.

projects.title: Agent AI Reporting
projects.description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates, drag-and-drop functionality, and team collaboration features.

letsConnect.title: Let's Connect
letsConnect.subtitle: Let's Connect
letsConnect.description: I'm always open to discussing new opportunities, interesting projects, or just having a chat about technology. Feel free to reach out through any of these platforms or take a quick action below.

quickActions.description: Drop me a line for project discussions

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Ready to start your next project? Let's discuss how I can help bring your ideas to life.
